description: Major biotechnology research thesis. Research to be in a technology or business/law/technology management area. May be undertaken in an Industry or International location. Students commencing in Semester 1 enrol in BIOT8003. Students commencing in Semester 2 enrol in BIOT8004. Students commencing in Summer Semester should enrol in BIOT8007. Part-time students must enrol in BIOT8005 over 4 semesters.
